schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of occupations to process in parallel

post.description:
1. Pull qualification SkillIDs.
2. Shortlist by those (or fallback to all occupations).
3. Compute weighted skilloverlap scores for each occupation.
4. Return those  threshold; if none, return top N by score.

parameters.name: top_n

schema.description: If no matches  threshold, return top N by score
schema.title: Top N

parameters.description: If no matches  threshold, return top N by score

schema.title: Response Get All Job Postings Jobposting All Get
Response Get All Applications Jobapplication All Get

post.description:
Extract numeric reading from LCD/digital meter images.
Saves crops under ./meter_debug/. Set return_debug=true to embed roi/band in response.
Return intermediate values for one frame: faces/bboxes, SFace, HSV, emotion, grooming/beard session status.
Detect garments and return feature vectors for each detection.

POST /ocr/read-meter
- Send multipart/form-data with either:
  * file=<uploaded image>   OR
  * image_path=<absolute or relative path on server>
- Optional knobs mirror lcd_ocr_fixed.process().
